name: Shoikan
overview: Shoikan\Crux is a game of logic that will not fail to thrill you. The concept is very simple: you have to arrange all the pieces on the screen so that at the end they are in the identical position (both in color and in place) to that indicated at the bottom. Published in both Magic Disk 64 1991/09 and in All C64 n.1 (1992/1993).
